app.debug.description: Enable debug mode for the web application
app.debug.name: Debug Mode

app.enable_notifications.description: Enable browser notifications for research events
app.enable_notifications.name: Enable Notifications

app.host.description: Host address to bind the web server
app.host.name: Web Host

llm.max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens in model responses
llm.max_tokens.name: Max Tokens

llm.context_window_size.description: Maximum context window size in tokens for the LLM
llm.context_window_size.name: Context Window Size

llm.supports_max_tokens.description: Whether the LLM API supports the 'max_tokens' option.
llm.supports_max_tokens.name: Supports 'Max Tokens'

llm.model.description: Language model to use for research and analysis
llm.model.name: LLM Model

llm.provider.description: Service provider for the language model
llm.provider.name: LLM Provider

llm.anthropic.api_key.description: API key to use for the Anthropic provider.
llm.anthropic.api_key.name: Anthropic API Key

llm.openai.api_key.description: API key to use for the OpenAI provider.
llm.openai.api_key.name: OpenAI API Key

llm.openai_endpoint.api_key.description: API key to use for the OpenAI-compatible endpoint provider.
llm.openai_endpoint.api_key.name: OpenAI Endpoint API Key

report.enable_fact_checking.description: Enable fact checking for report contents
report.enable_fact_checking.name: Enable Fact Checking

report.searches_per_section.description: Number of searches to run per report section
report.searches_per_section.name: Searches Per Section

search.max_filtered_results.description: Maximum number of search results to display after relevance filtering
search.max_filtered_results.name: Max Filtered Results

search.max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to retrieve
search.max_results.name: Max Results

search.final_max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to include in the final report.
search.final_max_results.name: Final Max Results

search.questions_per_iteration.description: Number of questions to generate per research cycle
search.questions_per_iteration.name: Questions Per Iteration

search.searches_per_section.description: Number of searches to run per report section
search.searches_per_section.name: Searches Per Section

search.skip_relevance_filter.description: Skip filtering search results for relevance
search.skip_relevance_filter.name: Skip Relevance Filter

search.journal_reputation.threshold.description: If enabled, journals with quality scores (scale from 1-10) below this threshold will be filtered out.
search.journal_reputation.threshold.name: Journal Quality Threshold

search.journal_reputation.max_context.description: Maximum number of characters to include in the prompt for journal quality checking.
search.journal_reputation.max_context.name: Journal Quality Context Size

search.journal_reputation.exclude_non_pu.description: If true, quality filtering will exclude results that do not have a published journal reference.
search.journal_reputation.exclude_non_pu.name: Exclude Non-Published Results

search.journal_reputation.reanalysis_per.description: Period at which to re-check the quality of journals.
search.journal_reputation.reanalysis_per.name: Quality Reanalysis Period

search.snippets_only.description: Only retrieve snippets instead of full search results
search.snippets_only.name: Snippets Only

search.tool.description: Web search engine to use for research
search.tool.name: Search Engine
